Dear Bob:
Many thanks for your letter of November 1st
concerning the Radio Drama Development Project at
WGBH. I hope the Corporation can get behind it
for another year of operation â€” as well as other
radio projects. I greatly appreciate your views

With best wishes.
Sincerely,
David C. Stewart
Director of Programs in
Education and Public Media
